title: What lightweight laptop brand is recommended? - Quora

response.answer_text: The lightweight machines are called Ultrabooks nowadays. Let me introduce some marvelous Ultrabooks of 2019 Dell XPS 13 (2019)  Asus ZenBook 13 UX333FA  Huawei MateBook X Pro  HP Spectre x360 (13-inch)  Microsoft Surface Laptop 2  Acer Swift 7  Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon  Lenovo IdeaPad 730S  LG Gram 17  Apple MacBook Air (2019)  Thanks Ellis Fox
HP Spectre x360 13”Dell XPS 13Apple MacBook 12”LG GramRazer Blade Stealth
